content:
Title: The Adventurous Life of Levi Mootz: From Lobster Boats to Linux

Introduction:

1. Welcome and introduction of Levi Mootz (1-2 minutes)
2. Brief background on Levi's exciting and diverse career (2-3 minutes)

Segment 1: Life in Overland Park and Universal Engraving (10 minutes)

1. Nostalgic memories of working together at Universal Engraving
2. Funny stories from their time at the company
3. How Levi's experiences in Overland Park influenced his future adventures

Segment 2: Real Estate and Lobster Boats in Brooklyn (15 minutes)

1. The story behind Levi's decision to open a real estate office in Brooklyn
2. Challenges and successes in the real estate business
3. Transitioning to work as a sternman on a lobster boat
4. Hilarious anecdotes from life on the lobster boat

Segment 3: The Irish Experience (15 minutes)

1. What inspired Levi to move to Ireland
2. Cultural differences and amusing experiences in Ireland
3. How living in Ireland impacted his personal and professional life

Segment 4: Becoming a Self-Taught Software Developer and Linux System Administrator (10 minutes)

1. The motivation to learn software development and system administration
2. Funny stories from the self-teaching journey
3. Challenges faced and how Levi overcame them

Segment 5: Returning to Overland Park (5 minutes)

1. The reasons behind coming back to Overland Park
2. The impact of Levi's diverse experiences on his current life and work
3. Future plans and aspirations

Closing Segment: Rapid Fire Questions and Final Thoughts (5 minutes)

1. Rapid fire questions for a few laughs (e.g., favorite food in Ireland, strangest real estate request, etc.)
2. Advice from Levi for those looking to embark on their own adventures
3. Final thoughts and closing remarks

Throughout the conversation, encourage Levi to share humorous anecdotes and experiences from his diverse career. Keep the tone light and entertaining while still delving into the depth of Levi's experiences.
